welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dolgoprudnyy, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historical landmarks, and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Дол Хлеб
restaurants.description: Дол Хлеб is a bakery located in Долгопрудный.

restaurants.name: Караван
restaurants.description: Караван is a asian restaurant located in Долгопрудный.

restaurants.name: Dodo Pizza (Dodo pizza)
restaurants.description: Dodo Pizza (Dodo pizza) is a pizzeria located in Долгопрудный.

restaurants.name: Моремания
restaurants.description: Моремания is a seafood restaurant located in Долгопрудный.

restaurants.name: LANDAU Cafe & Grill Bar
restaurants.description: LANDAU Cafe & Grill Bar is a bbq joint located in Москва.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Sheremetyevo International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chkalovsky Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chkalovsky Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vnukovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
